column2: All Rulers above the rank of Lord accumulate Technology Points in each of the three groups based on their Attributes.\nThese points can then be spent to increase the technological level in their capital.\nTechnology can also spread to neighbouring provinces, between demesne provinces or in Trade Zones.
Improved leather armour for light troops and archers.
Improved armour for warriors and cavalrymen.
Better forged weapons for spearmen and warriors.
Better forged weapons for light horsemen and cavalry.
Advanced military tactics result in increased morale and battles won with fewer losses.
Improved agricultural methods result in greater income from rural castle holdings.
Improved trading practices result in greater tax income from towns and cities.
Investigate new ways to wring your dues from the local priests.
Advanced buildings and structures for castle holdings.
Advanced buildings and structures for town and temple holdings.
Improved buildings and structures for temple and church holdings.
Improved architectural solutions and building techniques.
Improved relations with vassal feudal lords.
Improved relations with vassal town burghers.
Our dynasty grows ever more prestigious.
Encourage spiritual art to glorify the Gods.
Acceptance of those of a different culture.
Acceptance of those of a different faith.
With clearly codified laws people are more likely to accept new rulers as rightful.
Better arms and armor for militians and archers.
Better arms and armor for warriors and spearmen.
Better arms and armor for infantry.
Better arms and armor for horsemen and cavalry.
Acceptance of others make it easier to rule over different cultures and religions.
By spending §Y$POINTS$§! $POINTTYPE$ you can increase this technology to level §Y$NEXTLEVEL$§!
Advancements in your Capital Province of $PROV$
Dark blue is the lowest and white is the highest level of advancement currently in the world.
Rulers of lower rank do not generate cultural advancement.
§YYou should Invest in a Technological Advance§!
You have enough Technology Points in a Technology Group to invest in any of its advances.
Removes the Pagan Homeland Attrition Penalty.
Current knowledge of Trade Practices is too low to build Trade Posts.
Allows the construction of Trade Posts.
